blogPost.excerpt: One of life’s most enjoyable moments is finding new favorite songs, but this is often a solo experience. We analyze you and a friend's Spotify listening histories to curate a playlist full of recommended songs made just for the two of you to Discover Together.
blogPost.body: One of life’s most enjoyable moments is finding new favorite songs, but this is often a solo experience. We analyze you and a friend's Spotify listening histories to curate a playlist full of recommended songs made just for the two of you to Discover Together.
blogPost.title: Discover Together - Spotify Discover playlist curated for 2 people with AI
blogPost.author: trustin

localize.description: 生活中最令人愉快的时刻之一就是寻找新的喜爱的歌曲，但这往往是一个人的体验。我们会分析你和朋友的Spotify听歌记录，为你们两个人精心策划一份播放列表，其中包含了大量的推荐歌曲，让你们一起发现。
localize.tagline: Spotify发现用AI为2人策划的播放列表。

localize.description: 生活中最令人愉快的時刻之一就是尋找新的喜愛的歌曲，但這往往是一個人的體驗。我們會分析你和朋友的Spotify聽歌記錄，爲你們兩個人精心策劃一份播放列表，其中包含了大量的推薦歌曲，讓你們一起發現。
localize.tagline: Spotify發現用AI爲2人策劃的播放列表。

previous.excerpt: Enhance your Notion pages with automatically updating date icons for: - today - yesterday - tomorrow - last/this/next week - last/this/next quarter - last/this/next month - last/this/next year
previous.title: Dynamic Calendar Icons for Notion - Add automatically updating date icons to your Notion

localize.description: 使用自动更新的日期图标来增强您的Notion页面。- 今天 - 昨天 - 明天 - 上周/本周/下周 - 上季度/本季度/下季度 - 上月/本月/下月 - 上年/本年/下年。
localize.tagline: 为您的Notion添加自动更新的日期图标。

localize.description: 使用自動更新的日期圖標來增強您的Notion頁面。- 今天 - 昨天 - 明天 - 上週/本週/下週 - 上季度/本季度/下季度 - 上月/本月/下月 - 上年/本年/下年。
localize.tagline: 爲您的Notion添加自動更新的日期圖標。

next.excerpt: Some rooms are just too big to engage with your Clubhouse audience. AskClubhouse is a free tool that allows your listeners to ask written questions, so you pick them and answer them live on stage.
next.title: AskClubhouse - Allow your Clubhouse audience to ask written questions

localize.description: 有些房间实在太大，无法与你的Clubhouse听众互动。AskClubhouse是一个免费的工具，它允许你的听众提出书面问题，所以你选择他们并在舞台上现场回答他们。
localize.tagline: 允许您的会所观众提出书面问题

localize.description: 有些房間實在太大，無法與你的Clubhouse聽衆互動。AskClubhouse是一個免費的工具，它允許你的聽衆提出書面問題，所以你選擇他們並在舞臺上現場回答他們。
localize.tagline: 允許您的會所觀衆提出書面問題
